Language.Text: Alle Macros in aktive Felder umwandeln
Klick auf Link im SAP EA Menü
Convert All Macros to Aktive Areas
Click Link in SAP EA Menu

MacroTemplate.Name: click
active_area
input_text
select_single
input_radio
beh_foe_bold
MacroTemplate.StringTemplate: ctx_behave = new winnavp_Behaviour();ctx_behave.name='$%behave_name$';ctx_behave.script='var frobj = winnavp_player.FreeObjects.Find("$%free_object$");var ns = frobj.FindElem("$%free_object_elem$");frobj.Reset();if (ns != null) ns.Bold = true;frobj.UpdateText();'; winnavp_behaviours.Insert(ctx_behave);

MacroTemplate.Name: beh_foe_change_state
MacroTemplate.StringTemplate: ctx_behave = new winnavp_Behaviour();ctx_behave.name='$%behave_name$';ctx_behave.script='var frobj = winnavp_player.FreeObjects.Find("$%free_object$");if (!$%exclusive$) {var ns = frobj.FindElem("$%free_object_elem$");if (ns != null) ns.enabled = $%enabled$;} else {frobj.EnableElemExcl("$%free_object_elem$", $%enabled$);} frobj.UpdateText();'; winnavp_behaviours.Insert(ctx_behave);

MacroTemplate.Name: beh_set_numvar
check_keyattr
MacroTemplate.StringTemplate: winnavp_conditionadmin.InsertCheck({name:'$%name$', condition:'$%condition$', check: 'return ctx_key != null && ctx_key[\"$%attr_name$\"] != null && ("$%attr_exists_only$" == "1" || "$%value$" == ctx_key[\"$%attr_name$\"]);'});
